articles.title: Bears finalize $58.4 million extension with S Jackson
articles.description: LAKE FOREST, Ill. (AP) — The Chicago Bears finalized a four-year contract extension with Eddie Jackson on Saturday, a day after his agency announced a $58.4 million deal that made him the NFL's highest paid safety.
articles.content:
LAKE FOREST, Ill. (AP) The Chicago Bears finalized a four-year contract extension with Eddie Jackson on Saturday, a day after his agency announced a $58.4 million deal that made him the NFL's highest paid safety.

articles.author: By MITCH STACY AP Sports Writer
articles.title: Dell stops 21 shots, Sharks stop Blue Jackets 3-2
articles.description: COLUMBUS, Ohio (AP) — Aaron Dell stopped 21 shots to lift the San Jose Sharks over the Columbus Blue Jackets 3-2 on Saturday.
articles.content:
COLUMBUS, Ohio (AP) Aaron Dell stopped 21 shots to lift the San Jose Sharks over the Columbus Blue Jackets 3-2 on Saturday.
Barclay Goodrow, Evander Kane and Kevin Labanc scored for the Sharks, who won their second straight and are 3-1-1 in their past five.… [+1326 chars]

articles.title: Noel nets 27, UMass Lowell whips UMBC 86-73 in OT
articles.description: BALTIMORE (AP) — Obadiah Noel scored a career-high 27 points, Christian Lutete added 20 and UMass Lowell blitzed UMBC in overtime for an 86-73 victory in the American East Conference opener on Saturday.
articles.content:
BALTIMORE (AP) Obadiah Noel scored a career-high 27 points, Christian Lutete added 20 and UMass Lowell blitzed UMBC in overtime for an 86-73 victory in the American East Conference opener on Saturday.

articles.title: Audit: University president spent $40K in policy violation
articles.description: FLAGSTAFF, Ariz. (AP) — Northern Arizona University paid more than $40,000 in travel expenses for President Rita Cheng and her husband that did not comply with university policies, according to a state audit.
articles.content:
FLAGSTAFF, Ariz. (AP) Northern Arizona University paid more than $40,000 in travel expenses for President Rita Cheng and her husband that did not comply with university policies, according to a state audit.

articles.title: Online charter school opposes teachers' unionization effort
articles.description: PORTLAND, Maine (AP) — Leadership at the state’s first online charter school is pushing back on efforts by teachers and staff to form a union.
articles.content:
PORTLAND, Maine (AP) Leadership at the states first online charter school is pushing back on efforts by teachers and staff to form a union.

articles.title: Police: Man finds child dead, wife hurt in Detroit-area home
articles.description: NOVI, Mich. (AP) — A man found his wife severely injured and toddler dead at their suburban Detroit home, authorities said.
articles.content:
NOVI, Mich. (AP) A man found his wife severely injured and toddler dead at their suburban Detroit home, authorities said.

articles.title: Clark, Key spark No. 19 Virginia past Hokies, 65-39

articles.title: Record number of salmon eggs found in Maine river
articles.description: EAST MACHIAS, Maine (AP) — Atlantic salmon laid a record number of eggs in a Maine river last year, according to a conservation group that tracks the animal's status in the wild.
articles.content:
EAST MACHIAS, Maine (AP) Atlantic salmon laid a record number of eggs in a Maine river last year, according to a conservation group that tracks the animal's status in the wild.
